com.fuzzylimes.jsr.clients

Class CategoryClient

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.fuzzylimes.jsr.clients.CategoryClient

  • public class CategoryClient
extends Object

    This client is used to make requests to the /categories set of resources on SpeedRun.com's API. The official documentation for this set of APIs can be found in the API Docs.

    Categories are the different rulesets for speedruns. Categories are either per-game or per-level (if the game uses individual levels), both can be accessed via this resource.

    The client uses static methods for all of the resource calls, so there is now need to initialize anything to make a request. Simply reference the resource you wish to use to retrieve a related pojo.

      • getCategoryRecords

        public static PagedResponse<Leaderboard> getCategoryRecords(String id,
                                                            Boolean embed,
                                                            CategoryRecordsQuery queryParams)
                                                     throws IOException,
                                                            UnexpectedResponseException
        GET categories/{id}/records

        Used to retrieve a list of Leaderboard records associated with a specific category id, filtered by a set of provided CategoryRecordsQuery query params and optionally enriched with embedded data objects.

        • Supports query parameters defined in CategoryRecordsQuery
        • Supports embedding with
        • API Docs
        Parameters:
        id - id of the category to query records for
        embed - whether or not to embed all additional, supported, embed items
        queryParams - CategoryRecordsQuery query parameters to be included in request
        Returns:
        a List of Leaderboard objects
        Throws:
        IOException - if something goes wrong with mapping
        UnexpectedResponseException - if non-2XX or no body returned to request
